<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DataUsed = <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/wholeprogramdevirt/accumbitvector/#ae7011a102dd8cb9663a12c0688377231">getPtrToData</a>(Pos / 8, 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (b)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#42;DataUsed.first |= 1 &lt;&lt; (Pos % 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!(&#42;DataUsed.second &amp; (1 &lt;&lt; Pos % 8)));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#42;DataUsed.second |= 1 &lt;&lt; (Pos % 8);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bits that will be stored before and after a particular vtable.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The bit vector that will be laid out before the vtable. Note that these</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// bytes are stored in reverse order until the globals are rebuilt. This means</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// from the target.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
